body:
Hi its me Crazy. I'm looking for some upbeat music for a video I'm making. Basically some thing upbeat and enjoyable to listen to.

My video is a couple sped up Nebula matches
body_tagged:
Hi its me Crazy. I'm looking for some upbeat music for a video I'm making. Basically some thing upbeat and enjoyable to listen to.

My video is a couple sped up Nebula matches
title: Whats some good, upbeat music?

replies.body: Are you looking for dubstep, EDM, electronic, etc. Or more like hip hop and pop?
replies.body_tagged: Are you looking for dubstep, EDM, electronic, etc. Or more like hip hop and pop?

replies.body: EDM Glitch-Hop Dubstep Electro House Drumstep Music
replies.body_tagged: EDM Glitch-Hop Dubstep Electro House Drumstep Music

replies.body: Nu Disco for background music, drumstep for intros, dubstep for outros. ;)
replies.body_tagged: Nu Disco for background music, drumstep for intros, dubstep for outros. ;)

replies.body: Do you want to build a snowman is pretty good, you may cry though
replies.body_tagged: Do you want to build a snowman is pretty good, you may cry though

replies.body:
This is more of a steady rhythm, so it has no drops. It means that it maintains more of an upright beat. More like Electronic House.

Link; http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uEOavBkGV9k ^

This song is Liquid Dubstep, so what that means is that is keeps a very melodic tune, yet similar to drops. It has a great counter melody, SFX, melody, bass and decent mellow drop, to give it more of an distinguishing feature of sound. It's more purified.(Not so upbeat, but a steady sound quality)

Link; http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U8qoE4tF8KU ^

This specific song is based on Electronic House aka Electro, which shows that is very electric to the different sound qualities as it performs. Self explanatory.

Link; http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VAYQTA0BDx4&list=UU1XoTfl_ctHKoEbe64yUC_g ^

This song is more synchronized and techno, yet it keeps a good rhythm with decent drops. Yet it doesn't change the melody or tune when it occurs a drop. This song has great SFX qualites ^-^

Link; http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tG3k5Zu5vDc ^

ADDITION;

This song has a great drop which keeps it melodic tune, as its very electric and synchronize, but maintains is simply original tune!

Link; http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nNLMvvGPBZc&list=UU1XoTfl_ctHKoEbe64yUC_g


Anyway, those were just some examples of unique sound qualities! :D Hope you like them!(;

If you need more music or would want to find a couple more great ones, skype me! I'll help you! ^-^

replies.body: OK the everyone! Now to choose which one....

replies.body:
My options: 
1 - Breakdown VIP (monstercat)

2 - Carl Rag EDM launchpad

3 - Do you want to build a snowman?

 Number 3 is top kek 12/4
